Biden: s initial recounting of the events portrayed Obama as a decisive leader who decided to move forward with the raid over Biden's advice.
Biden later claimed that in a one: on-one meeting with Obama, he told the president to "follow your instincts" regarding the raid.
The Republican National Committee accuse: 4. Biden never explicitly stated that he advised Obama not to go after bin Laden, but rather expressed his belief that further confirmation of bin Laden's presence was needed before proceeding with the raid.
